{{Infobox series|image=Heroes of Goo Jit Zu logo.svg|creator={{w|Moose Toys}}|genre=Elastic action figure}}

'''Heroes of Goo Jit Zu''' is a toyline produced by {{Wikipedia|Moose Toys}}, which has collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]].

== Background ==
[[File:Heroes of Goo Jit Zu.webp|left|frameless|width=220x220]]
Heroes of Goo Jit Zu is a series of stretchable action figures, similar to {{Wikipedia|Stretch Armstrong}}, with the characters having transparent insides exposing slime inside. The series began with its own roster of unique characters, but branched out to feature characters from other franchises,<ref>{{YouTube link|cfbHSLES9gs|ðŸ’§ Water Vs Fire ðŸ”¥ {{!}} Heroes of Goo Jit Zu {{!}} Cartoons for Kids {{!}} Moose Mania|Moose Mania|March 2, 2025}}</ref> such as [[Sonic the Hedgehog]], [[Toy Story]], {{Wikipedia|WWE}}, and ''{{Wikipedia|One Piece}}''.
{{-}}
